attributes.action: Stop there getting terminal six built at Heathrow and Gatwick airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE don`t want terminal six to get built as planes polute the inviorment And plane fumes are destroying wildlife and soon we will be breathing in 87 perscent of plane fumes. If the goverment really care about our future then they should stop terminal six getting built.
